content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #246

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 40

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section:
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

To reduce the implementation burden on EHRs that support CDS Services, CDS Hooks recommends that prefetch queries only use a subset of the full functionality available in the FHIR specification. Valid prefetch URLs should only contain

Comment:
Prefetch URL ? New term – is this the same a prefetch template?

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will update the documentation to use the term prefetch template rather than prefetch URL.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #246

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #246

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will update the documentation to use the term prefetch template rather than prefetch URL.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
